About Me

I'm a rising senior at UPenn studying Computer Engineering. I recently wrapped up a Platform Engineering Internship at Bilt Rewards, where I worked on building scalable backend services and cloud infrastructure. I am currently a Fullstack SWE at Keep.id.


I'm interested in web3, agentic AI, and cloud technologies. In my free time, I like to run and read sci-fi books.
